text: jise allaah hee maarg dikhae vahee maarg paanevaala hai aur vah jise pathabhrasht hone de, to aise logon ke lie usase itar tum sahaayak na paoge. qiyaamat ke din ham unhen aundhe munh is dasha mein ikattha karenge ki ve andhe goonge aur bahare honge. unaka thikaana jahannam hai. jab bhee usakee aag dheemee padane lagegee to ham use unake lie bhadaka denge
